response.overview: LAVABO HOLOCAUST opens in the jungle. Professor Giuliano Borsato (Martijn Jansen) and his assistant Sofia Barboni (Nana Hilarius) make their way through the – rather Dutch-looking – vegetation. Barsato has barely explained that they are searching for the secret of eternal youth when he is attacked by a zombie: "Damn, that hurts! Can you bandage me up?"  In "28 Giorni Doppo," police inspector Gianfranco Girolami (Simon Alderliesten) and his eternal enemy Pupo Rigate (Dirk Jan Hendriks), a reporter for the Lavabo Gazette, are confronted with the consequences. The irascible inspector ("Nobody calls me a failed Baantjer!") witnesses the mysterious death of the brother of the recently disappeared professor during an occult séance. Elsewhere in the city, a masked man is tearing the entrails out of young women.
response.tagline: What could possibly go wrong? What couldn't possibly go wrong?
response.title: Lavabo Holocaust
